special_text:
[+1]: You may put an artifact card with mana value 2 or less from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.
[0]: Target artifact or creature loses all abilities and becomes a colorless Vehicle artifact with base power and toughness 4/4 and crew 1.
[-6]: Deacon Bay Docks loses all abilities and becomes a colorless Vehicle artifact with base power and toughness 10/10, indestructible, crew 1, and “Whenever Deacon Bay Docks attacks, exile target permanent.” [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
